title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Linking Theory and Practice in STEM Education: Mathematical Job Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience as an in-house corporate training manager
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can present three specific strategies for connecting theory and practice in mathematics education cases within corporate environments.
Learners can implement job-specific instructional design using a supportive process pedagogy framework.
Learners develop an action plan to solve real-world problems in mathematics education settings through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
